en.title: Edit Image with AI
en.noteText: This tool uses Gemini Vision to analyze your image and provide editing suggestions. For actual image editing, it will describe the changes - you'll need to apply them manually or use image editing software.
en.instructionPlaceholder: Example: make the background darker, add more contrast, suggest color corrections...
en.instructionHint: Describe what you want to change or improve in the image

seo.whatIsContent: **AI Vision Chat** uses **Google Gemini Vision** to analyze images and answer questions about them. Ask about objects, text, colors, composition, or get detailed descriptions of any image.
howToSteps: Upload an **image** you want to analyze
Get **detailed AI responses** about the image
seo.useCasesTitle: Use cases for AI vision chat

faq.question: Is AI vision chat free?
faq.answer: Requires a **free Google Gemini API key**. Get one at [Google AI Studio](https://aistudio.google.com/app/apikey). The key is stored locally in your browser.

faq.question: What can it recognize?
faq.answer: Can identify **objects, people, text, colors, scenes, emotions, brands, landmarks**, and provide detailed descriptions of image content.

faq.question: Does it work with any image?
faq.answer: Yes! Works with **JPG, PNG, WebP, GIF** and most image formats. Best results with clear, well-lit images.
